summary: Base class that encapsulates shared functionality for Flax implementations of the BigBird transformer, handling configuration, weight loading, and common utilities for downstream BigBird models.
business_intent: Provide a reusable foundation for building, fine‑tuning, and deploying BigBird models in Flax/JAX environments, enabling efficient processing of long‑sequence NLP tasks such as document classification, summarization, and question answering.
